sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SPRING.BBS ( BBS_ID, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_FILE) VALUES ( bbs_seq.nextval, #bbsTitle#, #bbsContent#, #bbsFile# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SPRING.BBS SET BBS_TITLE = #bbsTitle#, BBS_CONTENT = #bbsContent#, BBS_FILE = #bbsFile# where bbs_id = #bbsId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT BBS_ID bbsId, BBS_TITLE bbsTitle, BBS_CONTENT bbsContent, BBS_FILE bbsFile FROM BBS WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId#
SELECT count(*) cnt FROM BBS where bbs_id > 0

select rnum , bbs_id bbsId, bbs_title bbsTitle, bbs_content bbsContent, bbs_file bbsFile from ( select /*+ index_desc(bbs, bbs_pk)*/ rownum rnum , bbs_id, bbs_title, bbs_content, bbs_file from bbs where bbs_id > 0 and rownum <= #lastIndex# ) where rnum > #firstIndex#
